reviewtext: the Camcorder Box and Spec says it is good for 1 MegaPixel photos.  It is a lie.  The image quality is like magnifying a 640 x 480 to 1 Megapixel.  The result is coarse pixelation of the photo... I called the Sony customer support and they told me, "if it looks good on the view finder, then Sony's job is done."  What [a lie].  Sony, wake up and don't tell lies!
